column4: Hello there! Is there anyone here who could help me or tell me where to find help regarding the nautilus places menu ?  I have a NTFS partition with windows that i am unable to get rid off from this menu

it is not mounted
Have you tried just removing it from the list or is it reappearing every boot?
how to remove it ? When i right click on this NTFS partition in nautilus i have only the option open, open in new window and mount ( or unmount if mounted )
- Remove isn't an option or is it greyed out?
it is greyed out
darn :(

yes, kalamot?
